article.title: Weekly News About Life Science Market!  15/09/2020
article.article:
News 15/09/20

SUS will provideCannabis-based medicine after regulation, Pazuello says. 

Since 2015, Brazil hasallowed the importation of the plant-based drug for the compassionate use ofpatients refractory to conventional treatment.


To produce Vaccines against Covid-19, Butantan will expand factory.

The Butantan Institute willstart in November this year, works at its plant to expand the productioncapacity of vaccines. The expectation of the São Paulo government is that theworks are ready from September next year.


Scarcity of packaging products affects Ceará's chemical industry.

Segments of cosmetics,pharmaceuticals, cleaning products, among others, may run out of stock of rawmaterials already in the next 30 days, if the offer is not normalized. Pricesof insums have gone up.


Normative Instruction No. 66 on the List National Classification of EconomicActivities - CNAE

Economic activities subjectto health surveillance by degree of risk and dependent on information forsanitary licensing purposes, as provided for in the sole paragraph of Article 6of the Resolution of the Collegiate Board - RDC No. 153, of April 26, 2017.


Eduardo Pazuello will be appointed as Minister of Health.

After four months as actingMinister of Health, Eduardo Pazuello will be effective in the charge. Theswearing-in ceremony will take place on Wednesday (16).


Sign up to stay on top of everything that happens in the Life Science, cosmetic and food industry.
